body.p: Shelbyville and Louisville, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Shelby McDowell. Father of Mary Ballard and Austin Ballard. Graduated from Shelby College and Hanover College. Graduated law school at Transylvania University in 1846. Appointed Judge of the U.S. District Court for Kentucky by Abraham Lincoln on October 20, 1861.
